channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: ðŸ”´ 17:21 Air Alarm to Chernivtsi Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: ðŸ”´ 17:21 Air Alarm to Chernivtsi Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Chernivtsi_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
